snippet: After an hourlong delay for rain, Nadal beat a fellow Spaniard, Pablo Carreno. Also advancing were second-seeded David Ferrer and fifth-seeded Dominic Thiem....
lead_paragraph: After an hourlong delay for rain, Nadal beat a fellow Spaniard, Pablo Carreno. Also advancing were second-seeded David Ferrer and fifth-seeded Dominic Thiem.

headline.print_headline: Nadal, Ferrer and Thiem Advance at Rio Open
headline.main: Rafael Nadal Reaches Second Round at Rio Open
